txt.en:
My friend, Girgish, Khôltekh's emissary, sent samples of my creations to the cook's guild in Umbar. The guild requested I join them to study under the masters there! My excitement at hearing this could not be contained. Harmelak herself is said to have sampled my stuffed crab creation and then immediately sent a waggon, guard, and coin to see me delivered safely to the city.

I hired Phâredar to oversee the collection of materials I require. Please consider continuing to work with her in my absence. If you ever find yourself in Umbar, please seek me out. I would like to thank you in a more proper fashion than with a hurried note.

Keteph
